alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock; Sheridan; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 3:11PM CST until February 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, bitter cold wind chills and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Wind chill values as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and panhandle Nebraska. * WHEN...From midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
